title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Tuesday, 31 May 2016 - BBC News
summary: clean-up under way after torrential rain brings flash flooding to parts of the county .
essex fire and rescue called to 13 flood incidents in the county .
further outbreaks of drizzle are expected overnight .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume on wednesday at 08:00 .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it from our live coverage of flash flooding in essex - thanks for stopping by .
we 'll be back tomorrow morning from 08:00 with updates for the county .
have a great evening and hope you can stay dry .

documents.title: the day flash flooding hit essex
text: thanks for joining our live coverage of flash flooding across parts of essex .
let 's recap on events that took place today :

documents.title: weather : remaining cloudy overnight - with outbreaks of light rain
text: further outbreaks of light rain or drizzle are expected overnight .
it will also remain rather cloudy and murky with fog or mist patches possible in places .
minimum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
wednesday will be a dull and damp day , with cloudy skies and further isolated outbreaks of rain or drizzle throughout .
it will also remain rather breezy , leading to a cool feel .
highs of 17c ( 63f ) .
you can stay up-to-date for the forecast in your area via bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: rain forces essex to settle for a draw against northants
text: it was n't to be for essex after they were forced to settle for a draw against northamptonshire due to the inclement weather .
the visitors required six wickets at the county ground to clinch the win but rain closed in and halted play from 11:25 .
it was abandoned just after 16:50 .
it 's not all bad news though , as essex remain top of division two .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: 'thoughtless ' drivers splashing canvey kiosk
text: time to hear from some more business owners on canvey affected by flooding today .
this is lea swann , who runs the fantasy island kiosk on eastern esplanade .
thoughtless drivers have been driving too fast and splashing my kiosk all the way along the seafront there 's a massive amount of water , but here it seems to be worse . ''

documents.title: canvey flooding : mp calls for action
text: the conservative mp for castle point posted this message on her facebook page following today 's flash floods on canvey island .

documents.title: that 's one way to water the lawn
text: nigel 's got some clearing up to do in his garden .
he tweeted us these photos from jarvis road on canvey .
luckily the fire service was able to offer a hand
`` fortunately it did n't get into the house , '' he said .

documents.title: cctv from outside flooded southend arcade
text: look east reporter mike liggins has been down to southend to look at today 's flood damage .
see his full report on bbc one in the east of england this evening from 18:30 .
cctv from the happidrome arcade in southend after heavy rain early this morning .
more on @ twitterid at 6.30pm
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: wet weather keeps essex cricketers indoors as well
text: it 's not just here that rain is disrupting matters .
essex cricketers are stuck indoors as the wet weather hits northamptonshire .
essex could do with some sunshine , otherwise the match is likely to end in a draw .
follow play ( if there is any ) here .

documents.title: picture : flooding at the hythe in colchester
text: more of your flooding from around essex .
this was taken at the hythe in colchester .
thanks to jo jo for sending us this one .

documents.title: canvey is 'sick of promises ' over flood elevation
text: the people of canvey are `` sick of promises '' when it comes to solutions to fixing their flood problems , according to one local councillor .
castle point district councillor barry campagna , of the canvey island independent party , was speaking to me from a flood-plagued furtherwick road earlier this morning .

there 's nobody here , the whole of the seafront is empty , the kids are off school and it should be buzzing the drains ca n't take the amount of surface water on canvey , they 're so old that they do n't know where some of them even go , and there 's no extra money . ''
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: a wet essex or a hot alicante ?
text: vikki also feels very sorry for us in damp essex today
wish you were here ?
@ twitterid i agree beautiful here in alicante just a mild 27°
vikki , mind if we use your tweet on the bbc website ?
no problem

documents.title: all lanes reopen after earlier flooding on london-bound a12
text: all lanes have reopened on the a12 london-bound at j14 due to flooding earlier today .
however , in the same direction , one lane is closed between j19 for the boreham interchange and j18 for danbury due to an accident .
travel updates can be found here .

documents.title: essex 's tony fisher makes it into work in time for his show
text: earlier we told you bbc essex presenter tony fisher was stuck at kelvedon railway station , and was worried he would n't make it to chelmsford in time for his show .
well , good news : tony arrived at the studio with enough time to spare to make a cuppa .
you can listen to him live here .

documents.title: essex flooding makes national headlines
text: we really are the county that everybody is talking about today :
meanwhile , the echo has uploaded a video of the clean-up at an arcade along southend seafront that was flooded earlier this morning .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : the worst has passed - but keep the brolly close
text: it looks as if the worst of the weather has passed .
it 'll remain rather cloudy this afternoon with outbreaks of drizzle .
feeling cool , highs of 15c ( 59f ) .
you 'll probably want to keep the brolly close .
latest weather updates can be found here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: watch : cars pass through flood water on canvey
text: earlier we told you about flooding on furtherwick road on canvey .
here 's some footage from the scene .

documents.title: driving lessons - or diving lessons ?
text: oh no this driving school car got in a bit of trouble in buttsbury wash , mountnessing road , ingatestone , earlier .
we called the driving school but it did n't want to comment .

documents.title: with love from gran canaria wish you were there ?
text: dean is feeling very sympathetic towards us all .
@ twitterid i see it 's a little bet wet back home in essex , 27 degrees and clear skies here in gran canaria
jealous could we use this on the bbc website please ?
of course

documents.title: firefighters respond to 13 separate flood calls
text: it 's been a busy morning for essex fire and rescue which says it has been called to 13 different flood incidents around the county .
areas affected include canvey , colchester , rochford , southend and westcliff .
larger incidents dealt with by the service this morning include :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: more flood from canvey
text: is that a wave ?

documents.title: how not to start half-term on canvey island
text: this is n't the start to half-term canvey business owner suzanne gray was hoping for .
instead of floods of families entering her arcade on furtherwick road , she 's having to deal with actual flooding , and it 's happened several times recently .
`` i 've been here 20 years .
the last three years it seems to be getting worse and worse , '' she said .

documents.title: essex flash floods : what we know
text: it 's pretty miserable outside so you 're best off staying put .
here 's a round-up of problems in the county due to flash flooding
if you have taken any we 'd love to share them .
you can get in touch using # esxlive or send us an email .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: planning on taking the tilbury to gravesend ferry ? think again
text: the tilbury to gravesend ferry service has been suspended due to strong winds .
for more info visit :
will the tilbury ferry be running again today at all ? ?
is there a replacement bus running ?

documents.title: furtherwick road on canvey island is becoming almost impassable
text: the floodwater is getting pretty deep at furtherwick road on canvey island .

documents.title: essex man stranded as train delays continue
text: you might hear a familiar voice if you 're stuck at kelvedon station this morning .
bbc essex presenter tony fisher is stranded there trying to get to our studios in chelmsford .
there are problems on the greater anglia line due to an electrical fault at stratford .
he said : `` at the moment i could be doing my show live from kelvedon station . ''
fingers crossed tony can make it here by 12:00 .

documents.title: essex caller on canvey flooding
text: essex has been hearing from callers reporting localised flooding in some areas .
john on canvey island is one of those .
he told sadie nine that his street , hellendoorn road , was under about 1ft ( 0.3m ) of water .
`` it 's coming up to the edge of the pavement ; some properties it 's overlapped into their front gardens .
the rain is easing , but any more and we could see problems , '' he said .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: flooding close to southend seafront
text: tom has tweeted us these photos taken close to southend seafront this morning
southend seafront flooding @ twitterid @ twitterid

documents.title: tesco southend 'open as normal ' despite flooding
text: earlier we brought you a showing standing water outside a tesco store in southend .
we 've just had this response from the company :
there has been flooding in the local area due to torrential rain .
we are dealing with the water near the southend extra store as quickly and as effectively as possible .
the store remains open as normal for customers . ''

documents.title: police attend flooding on a12
text: you 'll find the latest travel updates for essex here .
# a12 be aware flooding between j14 & j13 london bound .
@ twitterid in attendance .

documents.title: flooding at tesco in southend
text: we 've had this sent to us from tesco in southend , just off the a127 , earlier this morning .
we 've contacted the store to find out more and are currently waiting a response .

documents.title: how much rainfall have you had since midnight ?
text: wondering how much rainfall your area has had since midnight ?
bbc forecaster chris bell tweeted this map .
current radar and lightning , ( with rainfall since midnight in mm ) impressive 40mm of rain at wattisham
- haha , if only it was that easy !
some impressive lightning hear near beccles through night and 27.6mm of rain
45mm at forncett st mary # southnorfolk
the weather here in costessey has been squally since last night .
driving wind and rain = no cycling for me today : (
48.6mm at stowmarket # suffolk
@ twitterid 32mm at capel st mary , suffolk , up to 9am
@ twitterid will it hit peterborough chris ? , want to know if should put the washing out
dry and sunny over here near coventry , now driving back to norwich into the rain .

documents.title: weather : very wet and windy
text: it 's a very wet and windy start to the day in essex , with thundery showers possible .
maximum temperature : 15c ( 59f ) .
heading out ?
stay up-to-date with the forecast for your area via bbc weather .
author: Georgina Burnett
BBC Weather

documents.title: electrical fault causes disruption on trains travelling through stratford
text: there are delays of up to 20 minutes on trains travelling through stratford due to an electrical fault .
greater anglia says tickets will be accepted on c2c services .
due to electrical supply problems at # stratford services to/from norwich , ipswich , colchester , clacton , southend vic are being disrupted .
rh
why is wifi not connecting on your trains from norwich to cambridge ?
which service please marion ?
rh
hi again how long will the disruption be expected for ?
my partner is hoping to get the 10:00 from norwich to liverpoolstreet
disruption expected until 10:00 at present darren .
rh
thanks again : )

documents.title: a look around a very wet essex
text: my sympathy goes out to the commuters travelling to london this morning in the grim weather
and not forgetting the dog walkers
share your photos with us using # esxlive or send us an email .

documents.title: yellow weather warning in place for essex
text: there 's a yellow weather warning in place across essex this morning from the met office .
it warns of torrential rain , frequent lightning and the risk of flash flooding up until 12:00 .

documents.title: good morning and welcome to essex live
text: morning , horrible out there is n't it ?
we 'll start by taking a look at what problems the wind and torrential rain has been causing around essex .
if you 'd like to get in touch at any time feel free to do so by using # esxlive .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
